title: "R Notebook"
output: html_notebook

```{r}
library("ggplot2")
library("datasauRus")
library('tidyverse')
library(purrr)
ggplot(datasaurus_dozen, aes(x = x, y = y, colour = dataset))+
  geom_point() +
  theme_void() +
  theme(legend.position = "none")+
  facet_wrap(~dataset, ncol = 3)
```
```{r}
datasaurus_dozen %>% 
  group_by(dataset) %>%
  summarise(mean_x=mean(x))
```
```{r}
datasaurus_dozen %>% 
  group_by(dataset) %>%
  summarise(mean_y=mean(y))
```
```{r}
datasaurus_dozen %>%
  group_by(dataset) %>%
  summarize(mean_x = mean(x),
            mean_y = mean(y),
            sd_x = sd(x),
            sd_y = sd(y))
```
